translation.src_text: Yo bat sé kat-la avan yo jwé
translation.tgt_text: They shuffled before they played

translation.src_text: Ng'ay pwan an kolasyon
translation.tgt_text: I'm going to have a snack

translation.src_text: Vis-la té ladjé

translation.src_text: Lè ou ka pwéché, sé pou ou pézé fò asou sé bagay sala
translation.tgt_text: When you preach, you must emphasize these things

translation.src_text: Madanm-lan ni an chay pli an fidji'y
translation.tgt_text: The woman has many wrinkles in her face

translation.src_text: Mwen té ka fè on kous èk gason mwen mé i bat mwen
translation.tgt_text: I was having a race with my son but he beat me

translation.src_text: An tan lontan sé madanm-lan té ka abiyé an dwiyèt pou dansé kòdwil
translation.tgt_text: Long ago the ladies wore the traditional dress to dance the quadrille

translation.src_text: I vlé pwan wivanj li asou nou
translation.tgt_text: He wants to take revenge on us

translation.src_text: La té ni pyé siyèz tousèl
translation.tgt_text: There were only cactus trees

translation.src_text: Bondyé ka ogoumanté lafwa nou
translation.tgt_text: God increases our faith

translation.src_text: Tan lontan moun té ka wété an kay pay
translation.tgt_text: Long ago people used to live in straw houses

translation.src_text: Tan lontan sété abò batiman moun té ka sòti Vyé Fò alé Kastwi
translation.tgt_text: Long ago people used to have to take ships to go from Vieux Fort to Castries

translation.src_text: Nou ka sélébwé Jounen Kwéyòl Entònasyonnal
translation.tgt_text: We are celebrating International Creole Day

translation.src_text: Yo ka senyen an pil zannimo lé Nwèl
translation.tgt_text: They kill many animals at Christmas

translation.src_text: Tibway-la pwan an koul bol asou gwenn li
translation.tgt_text: The boy got hit by a ball on his testicles

translation.src_text: Yo ka chaché pou ti manmay-la ki té pèd-la
translation.tgt_text: They're looking for the child who got lost

translation.src_text: Sé moun-an fè an chay akizasyon kont nonm-lan, mé i pa jenmen konfésé
translation.tgt_text: The people made many accusations against the man, but he never confessed

translation.src_text: Yo wèsté la pou si mwa
translation.tgt_text: They stayed there fore six months

translation.src_text: Mi nonm vanta, i, misyé
translation.tgt_text: Look a man who likes to boast

translation.src_text: I ka pifwé koton-an
translation.tgt_text: She's carding the cotton

translation.src_text: Savann-an té plen pwa gwaté
translation.tgt_text: The field was full of itching peas

translation.src_text: Yo viwé asou senkyenm jou-a
translation.tgt_text: They returned on the fifth day

translation.src_text: Lézèksis bon pou santé'w
translation.tgt_text: Exercise is good for your health

translation.src_text: Jennenwasyon sala pa ni pyès wèspé pou Bondyé
translation.tgt_text: Put it there for all their generations to see it

translation.src_text: Papa mwen sé on dogla
translation.tgt_text: My father is half Indian

translation.src_text: Sé nonm sala ka vann ton
translation.tgt_text: Those men are selling tuna

translation.src_text: Sak kopra-a byen foulé
translation.tgt_text: The bag of copra is packed quite densely

translation.src_text: Toulé jou yo ka alé an jaden mé ou pa ka wè sa yo ka fè
translation.tgt_text: Every day they go to the garden but you cannot see what they are doing

translation.src_text: Sé Bondyé ki sové'w pa lagwas li
translation.tgt_text: It is God who saved you by his grace

translation.src_text: Nou wè'y abò yon motoka
translation.tgt_text: We saw him in a car

translation.src_text: Sé avèg-la wè èk enfimité té ka maché
translation.tgt_text: The blind saw and the crippled were walking

translation.src_text: Yo ka endiké sé ti manmay-la
translation.tgt_text: They're educating the children

translation.src_text: Mwen ka mandé tout sé bagay an non Jézi Kwi, ensiswatil
translation.tgt_text: I ask all of these things in the name of Jesus Christ, amen

translation.src_text: Yo fawouché sé kwibich-la
translation.tgt_text: They frightened the crayfish

translation.src_text: Mwen té ni pou mété an lòt bouton an chimiz-la
translation.tgt_text: I had to put a new button on the shirt

translation.src_text: Yo alé pwan on ben lanmè
translation.tgt_text: They went for a sea bath

translation.src_text: I ka lavé lèwèstan sé had-la
translation.tgt_text: She's washing the rest of the clothes

translation.src_text: Tan lontan lawivyè té benyen kamo
translation.tgt_text: Long ago the rivers were filled with 'kamo' fish

translation.src_text: Chapantyé-a ka fè pli bon twavay pis i ni on galè nèf
translation.tgt_text: The carpenter is doing better work because he has a new plane

translation.src_text: Mizik-la èk chanté-a pa ka tèl
translation.tgt_text: The music and the singing don't mesh

translation.src_text: Machann-an ka vann fwitaj
translation.tgt_text: The vendor sells fruit

translation.src_text: Lè i tonbé, i kasé dwèt li
translation.tgt_text: When he fell, he broke his finger

translation.src_text: Adan moun ka èspéyé on wévolisyon
translation.tgt_text: Some people are waiting for a revolution

translation.src_text: Yo ka vann ti lonyon èk diten bò laplas-la
translation.tgt_text: They sell chives and thyme by the market

translation.src_text: Mwen tjwé an jibyé épi katapòl mwen
translation.tgt_text: I killed a bird with my slingshot

translation.src_text: Jiwòf bon an dité kako
translation.tgt_text: Cloves are good in cocoa tea

translation.src_text: Sé fig-la p'òkò mi
translation.tgt_text: The bananas are not yet ripe

translation.src_text: I mété kolyé-a an kou kabwit-la
translation.tgt_text: He put the collar on the goat's neck

translation.src_text: Misyé-a té anba otjipasyon ich li dépi lè i tonbé malad
translation.tgt_text: The man was under his child's care since he fell sick

translation.src_text: I pli ho pasé sé lézòt fwè'y-la
translation.tgt_text: He's taller than his other brothers

translation.src_text: I twouvé papyé-a ofon an panyen
translation.tgt_text: He found the paper at the bottom of a basket

translation.src_text: Mwen fè bayè mwen tout an fè
translation.tgt_text: I made my gate out of iron

translation.src_text: Pèsi ka bay manjé bon gou
translation.tgt_text: Parsley gives food a good taste

translation.src_text: Nonm-lan ni an maladi an jak li
translation.tgt_text: The man has a sickness in his penis

translation.src_text: Lè ou wè jaden-an ja blé, vyann san zo ka vin manjé'y
translation.tgt_text: When you see the garden is green, slugs come to eat it

translation.src_text: La kay ni fo témwen
translation.tgt_text: There will be false witnesses

translation.src_text: I mété sé tjwiyè-a asou tab-la
translation.tgt_text: She put the spoons on the table

translation.src_text: Tifi sala sé on tifi ki cho
translation.tgt_text: That girl is flirtatious

translation.src_text: Yo pè najé an basen-an
translation.tgt_text: They are afraid to swim in the basin

translation.src_text: Dlo-a té tèlman klè nou té ka wè tout ofon'y
translation.tgt_text: The water was so clear we could see to the bottom

translation.src_text: Lè i wivé bò pi-a, i fè sé kanmèl-la kouché
translation.tgt_text: When he arrived near the well, he made the camels lie down

translation.src_text: Fèsten-an pwan plas lanné pasé
translation.tgt_text: The festival took place last year

translation.src_text: Ay jété pòt chanm-lan
translation.tgt_text: Go empty the chamber pot

translation.src_text: Ou pwen tout sé bon tanmadòz-la, mé ou ban mwen sé pachpach-la
translation.tgt_text: You took all the good tomatoes, but you gave me the lesser ones

translation.src_text: Sé pou'w blanchi chimiz sala
translation.tgt_text: You must bleach that shirt

translation.src_text: Yo vlé patisipasyon tout moun
translation.tgt_text: They want everyone's participation

translation.src_text: Apwé mwen di yo oplèz mwen pati asou chimen mwen
translation.tgt_text: After I said farewell I went on my way

translation.src_text: Pyé bwa-a founi twòp
translation.tgt_text: The tree has too many leaves

translation.src_text: Zèl jibyé-a kasé
translation.tgt_text: The bird's wing is broken

translation.src_text: Séléwatè matjé asou fidji'y
translation.tgt_text: Wickedness is written all over his face

translation.src_text: I ka balansé lanmen'y kon on sòlda
translation.tgt_text: He's swinging his arms like a soldier

translation.tgt_text: Attention everybody! Today I am letting you off early

translation.src_text: Sé pou ou véyé nonm sala – i kochi an chay

translation.src_text: Piti an piti nou kay fini
translation.tgt_text: Gradually we will finish

translation.src_text: I té kontan tèlman, i té ni an sik an dan'y lè i wè mawi'y

translation.src_text: Lajan-an ou dwé mwen-an, kité sa

translation.src_text: Lafimé-a fè'y bat zyé'y
translation.tgt_text: The smoke made him blink

translation.src_text: Tjatjèt-la ou achté bay finèt-la twò piti

translation.tgt_text: The butcher cut the meat with a cutlass

translation.src_text: I alé lopital pansé bobo'y
translation.tgt_text: He went to the hospital to dress his sore

translation.src_text: Zépon kòk sala twò lonng
translation.tgt_text: That rooster's spur is too long

translation.src_text: Yo konblé an chéd-la paski yo pa té vlé lapli-a mouyé yo
translation.tgt_text: The crowded in the shelter because they didn't want the rain to get them wet

translation.src_text: Mwen fè kat pwélé fawin pou jouné-a
translation.tgt_text: I made four batches of cassava flour for the day

translation.src_text: Kanòt-la ka koupé dlo
translation.tgt_text: The boat is going fast

translation.src_text: Nou kay pati lòt simenn
translation.tgt_text: We will leave next week

translation.src_text: Sonmèy pwan ti manmay-la
translation.tgt_text: Sleep overto ok the child

translation.src_text: La ni twòp halé kasé anpami sé moun-an

translation.src_text: I bouwé tè-a oliwon pyé fig-la i fin planté-a
translation.tgt_text: He heaped up soil around the banana tree he had just planted

translation.src_text: Mwen ni lidé yo kay vini jòdi-a
translation.tgt_text: I think they will come today

translation.src_text: Nou ka fè bon pwogwé asou kay-la
translation.tgt_text: We're making good progress on the house

translation.src_text: Sé blag ou-a ka anmizé mwen an chay
translation.tgt_text: Your jokes amuse me a lot

translation.src_text: Nonm sala sé on milat
translation.tgt_text: This man is a mulatto

translation.src_text: I vini, magwé i pa té ni pyès lajan

translation.src_text: Lékòl-la pa ni asé titja

translation.src_text: Bava-a dépayé vitman paski i sav i té kay pèd

translation.tgt_text: The man is poor

translation.src_text: Joel? Ti, manm

translation.tgt_text: He found himself in an accident

translation.tgt_text: I have already been to ev ery little corner of Saint Lucia

translation.tgt_text: I fell right in front of the door

translation.src_text: Tifi sala ni an bèl ganm

translation.src_text: Biwo-a fèt épi bwa akajou

translation.src_text: Diskasyon sala pwen an chay tan mé i té entéwésan

translation.src_text: Ou toujou ka alé bò chimen-an ka aché twen
translation.tgt_text: You always go by the road looking for trouble

translation.src_text: Sépawé manjé-a pou nou manjé
translation.tgt_text: Divide the food for us to eat

translation.tgt_text: Stewed chicken is good with dasheen

translation.src_text: I bo ti manmay-la

translation.src_text: Mwen fè on fo pa la

translation.src_text: Yo kay délivwé sé chèz-la nou achté-a
translation.tgt_text: They'll deliver the chairs that we bought

translation.src_text: Sé moun sala pa ni djè endikasyon
translation.tgt_text: Those people have hardly any education

translation.src_text: Mwen té ka fouyé bandja épi mwen jwenn an èskoupyon

translation.src_text: Bouwik-la koumansé maté
translation.tgt_text: The donkey began to buck

translation.src_text: Mwen yonn ki ka twavay

translation.src_text: Kannòt-la koulé dwèt an lawad-la
translation.tgt_text: The canoe sank right in the harbour

translation.src_text: Vèglay sala ka vèglé mwen
translation.tgt_text: That glare is blinding me

translation.src_text: Pwan liv sala mé kité sé sala
translation.tgt_text: Take this book but leave those

translation.src_text: Nou ka tjiwé dan nou toulé jou

translation.src_text: Misyé ni mal chans pasé pyèsonn mwen konnèt

translation.src_text: Ti manmay-la ka babouyé tout kò'y èk manjé-a

translation.src_text: Mwen ki manman'w; pa tèsté épi mwen
translation.tgt_text: I am your mother; don't talk back to me

translation.src_text: Yo bouché dé moun sala ka fè fònikasyon

translation.src_text: Mwen kay pòté plent kont ou

translation.src_text: Yo pa té sa tjenn zyé yo ouvè

translation.tgt_text: He went to the funeral because the dead person was his relative

translation.tgt_text: Today is Christmas

translation.src_text: Anbadjo moun pa ka kwè sa

translation.src_text: Lè lapli sé savann-an ka benyen kayal

translation.src_text: Mwen enmen péché kawanng

translation.src_text: Yo ni tout sòt kalté maladi

translation.src_text: Sé pa pou ou vann sé fig pijé sala

translation.tgt_text: Cowards live a lo ng time

translation.src_text: Yo kondanné nonm-lan pou mové akson-an i té fè-a

translation.src_text: Yo ka fè lasi èk kasav myèl
translation.tgt_text: They make wax from honeycombs

translation.src_text: Tan lontan manmay té ka fè bolonm èk tè gwa
translation.tgt_text: Long ago children used to make dolls with clay

translation.src_text: Si endik sété lajan, sé pa mwen ou té kay bay li
translation.tgt_text: If advice were money, you wouldn't give it to me

translation.src_text: Koutwiyèz sala ka pwan chè pou koud
translation.tgt_text: This seamstress charges a lot to sew

translation.src_text: I té ka hélé lè nou wivé

translation.src_text: Sé pa pou'w kontan twòp fèt èk twòp bwason
translation.tgt_text: You must not love too much partying and drinking

translation.src_text: Lè ou alé an souf, la toujou ni on moun pou djidé'w

translation.src_text: Mwen fè yon kwi lè kwapo-a soté asou mwen
translation.tgt_text: I let out a scream when the frog jumped on me

translation.src_text: Lè ou alé an vil, pòté kéchòz ban mwen
translation.tgt_text: When you go to town, bring something back for me

translation.src_text: Tè sala bon pou planté lédjim
translation.tgt_text: This ground is good for planting vegetables

translation.src_text: Mwen ka konpozé an bèl chanté bay wa-a
translation.tgt_text: I am composing a beautiful song for the king

translation.src_text: Nonm sala abiyé kon on moun ka wèsté andidan palé
translation.tgt_text: That man is dressed like a man who lives in a palace

translation.src_text: Nou ka pwédyé bay Bondyé
translation.tgt_text: We pray to God

translation.src_text: Gason-an fin kon an gòlèt
translation.tgt_text: The boy is as thin as a stick

translation.src_text: Madanm sala benyen vous
translation.tgt_text: That woman has a bad temperament

translation.src_text: Tan kawenm moun ka bati kay
translation.tgt_text: In the dry season people build houses

translation.src_text: Lè yo wè mizi pwé aksidan-an fèt douvan yo, yo sézi
translation.tgt_text: When they saw how close the accident happened in front of them, they were astonished

translation.src_text: Vini denmen èk mennen tout sé liv-la
translation.tgt_text: Come tomorrow and bring all the books

translation.src_text: Nonm sala kwè i sé on gwo pitja
translation.tgt_text: That man thinks he is a big shot

translation.src_text: Dòktè-a di mwen sé pa pou mwen manjé jòn zé
translation.tgt_text: The doctor told me I shouldn't eat egg yolks

translation.src_text: Lè manman-an kité tibway-la, i pwan chagwen èk i mantjé mò
translation.tgt_text: When the mother left the boy, he was overtaken with grief and he almost died

translation.src_text: La ni tout sòt kalté vis an vil sala

translation.src_text: Chapé kò'w avan lapli-a kwévé

translation.tgt_text: He's a brave man

translation.src_text: Yo benyen tifi-a an dlo ajenni
translation.tgt_text: They bathed the girl in the fountain of youth

translation.src_text: I bat li èk baton-an
translation.tgt_text: He hit him with the stick

translation.src_text: Yo pèd bawo lapòt-la èk yo té ni pou mawé'y épi an kòd
translation.tgt_text: They lost the bar of the door and they had to secure it with a rope

translation.tgt_text: His father has become deaf

translation.src_text: Mizik fwansé sé an mizik ki cho
translation.tgt_text: The French music is lively

translation.src_text: Gadè-a mété atik li ansanm pou'y té fè wimèd bay nonm-lan

translation.src_text: Nou wè'y avan i pati
translation.tgt_text: We saw him before he left

translation.src_text: Chak lè i vini vizité nou i ka mennen blad bay sé ti manmay-la
translation.tgt_text: Every time he comes to visit us he brings a balloon for the children

translation.src_text: I kasé zo bazou nonm-lan èk an koul pwen

translation.src_text: Nonm sala ja wivé
translation.tgt_text: That man has made it financially

translation.src_text: Kay lodyans-lan plen moun mé nou p'òkò wè jij-la

translation.src_text: Sé moun-an i té envité-a pa chyé anlè sé sèvant li-a
translation.tgt_text: The people he had invited didn't pay any attention to his servants

translation.src_text: Pa fè blag épi tibway sala; i séléwa an chay
translation.tgt_text: Don't joke around with that boy; he is very wicked

translation.src_text: Atjòlman moun ka fè tout bagay alavidèy
translation.tgt_text: Now people do everything openly

translation.src_text: Misyé sala sanm ni an chay jès
translation.tgt_text: This man has a lot of tricks

translation.src_text: Nonm sala toujou anwajé pou lajan
translation.tgt_text: That man always covets money

translation.src_text: Tibway-la ka chayé dlo épi an bonm zenk
translation.tgt_text: The boy is carrying water with a galvanized bucket

translation.src_text: Dékoud had sala èk koud li pli mèyè, souplé
translation.tgt_text: Unsew this garment and resew it better, please

translation.src_text: Si ou alé Anglitè anlè vakans, chanjmandè-a kay bon pou'w
translation.tgt_text: If you go to England on vacation, the change of setting will be good for you

translation.src_text: Misyé-a pa natiwèl pyès; i sanm ja bwè wonm
translation.tgt_text: The man is not sober at all; it seems like he has been drinking rum

translation.src_text: Bonmaten-an lanmè-a bas
translation.tgt_text: This morning the sea is at low tide

translation.src_text: Vòlè-a té ni on mas; sé sa ki fè nou pa wè fidji'y
translation.tgt_text: The thief was wearing a mask; that is why we didn't see his face

translation.src_text: Mwen tjébé bèf-la ki manjé jaden mwen-an lapwiz
translation.tgt_text: I captured the cow that was eating my garden

translation.src_text: Yo ja ka fouyé yanm-lan déja
translation.tgt_text: They're digging yams already

translation.src_text: Mano fouyé bòs li an penti-a èk i koumansé pentiwé
translation.tgt_text: Mano dipped his brush into the paint and he began to paint

translation.src_text: Ti manmay-la ka motjé papa'y
translation.tgt_text: The child is mocking his father

translation.src_text: Mwen pa vlé ou malkonpwann mwen, ou sav
translation.tgt_text: I don't want you to misunderstand me, you know

translation.src_text: Yo ka najé an lanmè-a
translation.tgt_text: They're swimming in the sea

translation.src_text: Yo mawé kannòt-la bò tjé-a
translation.tgt_text: They tied the canoe by the dock

translation.src_text: Sé moun-an té ka wèsté san manjé èk pwédyé lè Bondyé wéponn lapwiyè yo
translation.tgt_text: The people were fasting and praying when God answered their prayer

translation.src_text: Ou ka twété mwen kon an èslav
translation.tgt_text: You are treating me as a slave

translation.src_text: Mwen sé an ofisyé an légliz mwen
translation.tgt_text: I am an officer in my church

translation.src_text: Gwo van-an fè sé lanm-lan gonflé an lawad-la
translation.tgt_text: The strong winds made the waves swell in the harbour

translation.src_text: Lè nonm-lan di'y bonswè pyèsonn pa wéponn
translation.tgt_text: When the man said good evening, nobody responded

translation.src_text: I fè an mélimélanj èk manjé-a, mé i té bon
translation.tgt_text: He made a mixture with the food, but it was good

translation.src_text: I vini bò kannòt-la
translation.tgt_text: He came near the boat

translation.src_text: Jibyé-a fè on nich asou pyé mango-a
translation.tgt_text: The bird made a nest in the mango tree

translation.src_text: Tan lapli sé tan jennton
translation.tgt_text: The rainy season is a time of June bugs

translation.src_text: Gason-an té mal élivé
translation.tgt_text: The boy was ill-mannered

translation.src_text: Dlo-a té ka bwilé'y tèlman i koumansé fè maji
translation.tgt_text: The water was burning him so much that he began to grimace

translation.src_text: Manman mwen té sipwi lè i tann sésé'y mò
translation.tgt_text: My mother was surprised when she hear her sister died

translation.src_text: Flandjé fig vèt-la pou ou sa gwennen'y
translation.tgt_text: Slit the green banana in order to peel it

translation.src_text: Madanm nonm-lan kité'y paski i té abizan
translation.tgt_text: The man's wife left him because he was abusive

translation.src_text: Nou kay viv épi Bondyé pou lavi diwant
translation.tgt_text: We will live with God for eternity

translation.src_text: Kwabyé ka manjé pwéson
translation.tgt_text: Herons eat fish

translation.src_text: Bobo-a ja vini anvlimé
translation.tgt_text: The sore has become inflamed

translation.src_text: I pwan an gwo van
translation.tgt_text: He took a deep breath

translation.src_text: Ban mwen toulé dé pil zowanj-lan
translation.tgt_text: Give me both heaps of oranges

translation.src_text: I pa fè sa pa dibonntèt li menm, sé fòsé yo fòsé'y fè'y
translation.tgt_text: He didn't do it by his own wisdom; they forced him to do it
